search_strings: AI agents for creative writing filetype:pdf related:.edu
AI tools for authors novel generation filetype:pdf related:.org
output.rationale: The user is interested in AI agents in creative writing. The first search string focuses on academic research ('filetype:pdf related:.edu') to understand the theoretical underpinnings and current applications of AI agents in this field. The second search string broadens the scope to include practical applications and tools ('filetype:pdf related:.org'), looking at how AI is being used by organizations and researchers to assist authors, particularly in novel generation.
